video.title: Octonauts
video.synopsis: A team of brave underwater explorers known as the Octonauts combs the world's oceans for aquatic creatures in desperate need of assistance.

episodes.synopsis: It's reef lobsters to the rescue when Kwazii's Gup-B breaks down; the Octonauts launch a determined search for an elusive giant squid.
episodes.title: The Undersea Storm / The Giant Squid

episodes.synopsis: The crew pursues crustaceans who've hijacked an Octopod; Captain Barnacles and Kwazii don walrus disguises to recover Peso's stolen medical kit.
episodes.title: The Great Algae Escape / The Walrus Chief

episodes.synopsis: A school of flying fish takes off with Professor Inkling's book; a narwhal comes to the Octonauts' rescue when arctic ice grounds the Octopod.
episodes.title: The Flying Fish / The Narwhal

episodes.synopsis: A treasure map leads the Octonauts to an incredible octopus; the crew tries to help an urchin and a carrier crab get along.
episodes.title: The Monster Map / The Crab & Urchin

episodes.synopsis: An albino humpback whale comes to the Octonauts with a serious case of sunburn; a group of remipedes helps Shellington find his way out of a cave.
episodes.title: The Albino Humpback Whale / The Remipedes

episodes.synopsis: Fiddler crabs help the Octonauts get a beached orca back into the water; the crew tries to get three blobfish to safety before a volcano blows.
episodes.title: The Orcas / The Blobfish Brothers

episodes.synopsis: A decorator crab with sticky fingers has been taking the Octonauts' things to outfit his shell; Dashi winds up inside a whale shark.
episodes.title: The Decorator Crab / The Whale Shark

episodes.synopsis: The Octonauts trace their ruined equipment to a trio of cookiecutter sharks; Shellington gets caught in a huge jellyfish bloom.
episodes.title: The Cookiecutter Shark / The Jellyfish Bloom

episodes.synopsis: Life's like an undersea rodeo when Barnacles and Kwazii ride some sailfish; Peso travels to the "Midnight Zone," where he meets a vampire squid.
episodes.title: The Speedy Sailfish / The Vampire Squid

episodes.synopsis: Fear drives a school of humuhumu fish into the Octopod's waterworks; Kwazii mistakes an enormous spider crab for an actual spider.
episodes.title: Humuhumus / Giant Spider Crab

episodes.synopsis: The Octonauts must trek through a kelp forest to find their Gup-B sub; Tweak and Peso try to help a hermit crab come out of his shell.
episodes.title: The Giant Kelp Forest / The Hermit Crab

episodes.synopsis: A hungry pilot fish comes in handy when the Octonauts run into a whitetip shark; music is the key to saving a pod of stranded beluga whales.
episodes.title: The Hungry Pilot Fish / The Beluga Whales

episodes.synopsis: The captain gets creative when a snot sea cucumber invades the Octopod; the Octonauts race to save a leatherback sea turtle from a giant whirlpool.
episodes.title: The Snot Sea Cucumber / The Giant Whirlpool

episodes.synopsis: Slime eels stand between Kwazii and pirate treasure; orcas come to the rescue when Captain Barnacles and Peso are lost in the Arctic Sea.
episodes.title: The Slime Eels / The Arctic Orcas

episodes.synopsis: The Octonauts comb the ocean to help a lost sea star find its home; Peso needs a helping hand when he gets caught in a giant comb jelly.
episodes.title: The Lost Sea Star / The Giant Jelly

episodes.synopsis: The Octonauts cross paths with a snapping shrimp; Peso's little brother, Pinto, shadows him on a rescue mission to save Shellington and Dashi.
episodes.title: The Snapping Shrimp / The Kelp Forest Rescue

episodes.synopsis: The Octonauts let an elephant seal molt inside the Octopod; the Octonauts help a lost sardine who's looking for her school.
episodes.title: The Enormous Elephant Seal / The Sardine School

episodes.synopsis: A migrating young eel needs the Octonauts' assistance on her journey upriver; the Octonauts team with dolphins to save a sickly coral reef.
episodes.title: The Eel Ordeal / The Dolphin Reef Rescue

episodes.synopsis: While seeking pirate treasure, the Octonauts meet a parrotfish; electric torpedo rays help the Octonauts jump-start a powerless Octopod.
episodes.title: Pirate Parrot Fish / Electric Torpedo Rays

episodes.synopsis: The Octonauts explore the "Midnight Zone" and discover a new worm species; the crew comes between two blue whales who are trying to communicate.
episodes.title: The Midnight Zone / The Mixed Up Whales

episodes.synopsis: The Octonauts try to help a seahorse find its missing mate, who is about to give birth; the crew becomes caught between two groups of anemones.
episodes.title: The Seahorse Tale / The Enemy Anemones

episodes.synopsis: A cuttlefish that can change shape has stolen Captain Barnacle's Octocompass; the Octonauts help a lemon shark find his way back home.
episodes.title: Crafty Cuttlefish / Lost Lemon Shark

episodes.synopsis: Kwazii looks after a baby dolphin who follows him home; the Octonauts meet a see-through spookfish while trying to rescue Peso from a trench.
episodes.title: The Baby Dolphin / The Scary Spookfish

episodes.synopsis: Dashi takes a picture of an oarfish that's unbelievably long; a shipwrecked Peso and Kwazii meet a fish who can walk on land.
episodes.title: The Oarfish / The Combtooth Blenny

episodes.synopsis: Ravenous marine iguanas devour all the Octonauts' seaweed; the Octonauts come to the aid of an injured dwarf lanternshark.
episodes.title: Marine Iguanas / Dwarf Lanternshark

episodes.synopsis: With his friends cheering him on, Peso competes in the annual Iron Clam Competition and goes up against a formidable adversary.
episodes.title: The Great Penguin Race

episodes.synopsis: Professor Inkling invites the Octonauts to his childhood home for the holidays, only to find that his octopus nephew is now endangered.
episodes.title: The Great Christmas Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Peso must perform an emergency fin bandage on a hungry great white shark; a poisonous sea krait lays her eggs in the garden pod.
episodes.title: Great White Shark / Sea Snakes

episodes.synopsis: Kwazii and Peso have their hands full baby-sitting a bunch of penguin chicks; Kwazii finds a mysterious, unbreakable coconut.
episodes.title: Adelie Penguins / Coconut Crabs

episodes.synopsis: The Octopod is attacked by a colossal squid; when a mouth-brooding jawfish father loses his eggs, the Octonauts help return them to him.
episodes.title: Colossal Squid / Jawfish

episodes.synopsis: In search of a mythical sword, Kwazii explores a shipwreck guarded by three swashbuckling swordfish; the Octonauts clean up a beach after a storm.
episodes.title: Flying Swords / Fiddler Crab

episodes.synopsis: Barnacles, Kwazii and Peso venture back inside a whale shark to retrieve a puffer fish; the Octonauts land in trouble while helping a young manta ray.
episodes.title: Porcupine Puffer / Manta Rays

episodes.synopsis: A timid sperm whale must conquer his fears to save Peso from a giant clam; Peso and Kwazii venture down to the midnight zone to help a hurt creature.
episodes.title: Scared Sperm Whale / Long Arm Squid

episodes.synopsis: A bowhead whale helps the Octonauts save a group of narwhals; the Octonauts help a group of algae-eating fish stand up to some aggressive damselfish.
episodes.title: Bowhead Whales / Damselfish

episodes.synopsis: The Octonauts travel deep down the Amazon River in search of a lost city -- and Kwazii's long-lost grandfather, Calico Jack!
episodes.title: Amazon Adventure

episodes.synopsis: The Octonauts use magnets to try to stop a meteor; the Octonauts help two young leafy sea dragons who were separated from their father.
episodes.title: Humphead Parrotfish / Leafy Sea Dragons

episodes.synopsis: Running out of air, Barnacles struggles to free his paw from a giant clam's mouth; the Octonauts try to recover an important vial of medicinal algae.
episodes.title: Manatees / Mimic Octopus

episodes.synopsis: When he's carried away by a cyclonic waterspout, Kwazii finds himself stranded; a gigantic saltwater crocodile wanders into freezing waters.
episodes.title: Triggerfish / Saltwater Crocodile

episodes.synopsis: Hungry gulper eels and undersea tremors threaten Inkling and Kwazii; the Octonauts transport a pair of invasive lionfish back to their native habitat.
episodes.title: Gulper Eels / Lionfish

episodes.synopsis: The Vegimals' plans for a Christmas feast aboard the Octopod are interrupted when the Octonauts are all entangled in a gigantic blob of sea snot!
episodes.title: Very Vegimal Christmas

episodes.synopsis: The team faces the heat of a lava tube to rescue a water bear; fearsome barracudas disrupt a mission to replant a mangrove forest.
episodes.title: Water Bears / Barracudas

episodes.synopsis: Peso must rescue the Octopod from a harpoon-shooting cone snail; Tweak and her team turn the Gup-F into a sanctuary when a storm destroys a reef.
episodes.title: Cone Snail / Artificial Reef

episodes.synopsis: A humpback whale helps Kwazii retrieve the key to a treasure chest; stinging platypuses attack the Octonauts after they find an unusual egg.
episodes.title: Humpback Whales / Platypus

episodes.synopsis: The Octonauts step in to help three mudskippers whose home has been swept away; the Octonauts discover a jellyfish that can seemingly live forever.
episodes.title: Mudskippers / Immortal Jellyfish

episodes.synopsis: Kwazii gets lost at sea and meets some sea skaters, the ocean's only insects; the Octonauts must stop a deep-sea creature from reaching the surface.
episodes.title: Sea Skaters / Siphonophore

episodes.synopsis: The Octonauts visit Shellington's sister and find the kelp forest besieged by urchins; the Octopod is threatened by a jellyfish's tentacles.
episodes.title: Urchin Invasion / Lionsmane Jelly

episodes.synopsis: The Octonauts help a flock of pelicans clean up a floating patch of garbage; the team observes mischievous baby hammerhead sharks on their first hunt.
episodes.title: Pelicans / Hammerhead Sharks

episodes.synopsis: The Octonauts look to old friends for help in rounding up wayward crabs; the Octonauts must stop some sea pigs from falling into the Mariana Trench.
episodes.title: Red Rock Crabs / Sea Pigs

episodes.synopsis: Peso tries to find out what's making a sea sponge sick; Barnacles seeks help from a sea turtle when a quake separates the Gup-X from its crew.
episodes.title: Sea Sponge / Loggerhead Sea Turtle

episodes.synopsis: A harbor seal detective helps find a remora that vanished while under Peso's care; the Octonauts face a ferocious yeti crab in the Midnight Zone.
episodes.title: Harbor Seal / Yeti Crab

episodes.synopsis: While the Octopod is in for repairs, the Octonauts take a vacation, and Peso helps Barnacles's sister and her cubs learn arctic survival.
episodes.title: Great Arctic Adventure (Earth Day Special)

episodes.synopsis: The team takes Tweak's new station into the deepest part of the ocean, where they encounter strange creatures and hazardous conditions.
episodes.title: Mariana Trench Adventure (Special)

episodes.synopsis: While researching Antarctica, the Octonauts must save a population of sea stars, urchins and other sea bed-dwelling creatures from a rare phenomenon.
episodes.title: Over / Under Adventure (Special)
